Article Title: AIADMK's stern warning to those in touch with Sasikala, expels 17 party workers, OPS elected deputy leader
Article Text: CHENNAI: The AIADMK on Monday warned of disciplinary action against those in the party if they interacted with ousted party leader V K Sasikala , even as it expelled 17 members including party spokesman V Pugazhendhi.Most of those expelled were said to have spoken to ousted former interim general secretary V K Sasikala.The AIADMK legislators' meeting, held at the party headquarters here, which passed the unanimous resolution warning of stern action, also elected partys coordinator O Panneerselvam as deputy leader of the opposition in the assembly.AIADMK co-coordinator and former chief minister K Palaniswami was on June 10 elected as leader of the opposition.At the meeting which lasted about three hours, the AIADMK lawmakers deliberated in detail about the issue of 'leaked phone calls' in the social media allegedly involving Sasikala with some of the AIADMK cadres.She had purportedly said she would make a comeback to the party in the near future."After announcing that she would stay away from politics ahead of the assembly elections, Sasikala now wants to take over the party after seeing the partys spectacular growth.This is evident from media reports of her conversation with some party members," the resolution moved by the leaders Panneerselvam and Palaniswami said.Calling for the immediate removal of all those who spoke to Sasikala over phone, the resolution said it was already warned through a statement on May 23 that stern action would be taken against those indulging in anti-party activities.Dismissing as "drama" Sasikala's reported telephonic conversation with its party members, AIADMK said the party can never be destroyed for the "desires of one family.""We have successfully completed Jayalalithaa's rule by disappointing those who thought that there will be more chaos in Tamil Nadu (following Jayalalithaa's demise)-- the AIADMK-led alliance won 75 seats, defeating conspiracies and won people's support," the resolution said.As the main opposition party, AIADMK has 66 MLAs, it said and condemned attempts of Sasikala to reach out to some members in the party."She is attempting to capture the party and enacting a strange drama by speaking to some over the phone," it said.Later, in a statement, the AIADMK announced expulsion of 17 party workers for anti-party activities.The meet elected Panneerselvam as the deputy leader of the opposition in the Assembly, while former minister S P Velumani was elected the party whip.S Ravi has been chosen as deputy whip, former minister Kadambur C Raju as treasurer, former minister K P Anbalagan as secretary and P H Manoj Pandian as deputy secretary, according to a release issued by the party leaders.Post poll, apart from sitting in opposition after a decade of rule, the AIADMK is beset with the issue of alleged leaked audio tapes purportedly involving the conversation of Sasikala who took over the party following the demise of J Jayalalithaa in 2016, and some AIADMK members.Following the merger of the two factions led by Pannerselvam and Palaniswami, the AIADMK ousted Sasikala.
Article Summary: The aiadmk warned of disciplinary action against those in the party if they interacted with ousted party leader v k sasikala. The party expelled 17 members including party spokesman v pugazhendhi. Most of those expelled were said to have spoken to ousted former interim general secretary v k bigfoot.

Article Title: $800,000 shortcut: Wealthy Indians buying their way past H-1B hurdles
Article Text:
Indian Workers Face New Challenge as US Tightens Work Visa Rules Amid Crackdown on H-1B Abuse

Gold Card versus EB-5



EB-5's rising momentum



MUMBAI: With a waiting queue running into several decades for an employment-linked Green Card, a growing number of Indians continue to resort to a faster way to live permanently in the US.The investment-linked Green Card program (EB-5) comes in handy for those H-1Bs who can afford it-despite the significant investment involved, a wait-time of a few years compares favourably with an endless wait for the coveted Green Card. The EB-5 program also finds favour among high networth individuals (HNIs) in India, who are looking at securing their children's future in America. Investors initially obtain a conditional Green Card, which is later converted into a permanent Green Card. (See table).Applicants are required to invest $800,000 (about Rs 7.1 crore) or $1,050,000 (about Rs 9.3 crore), depending on the project's type and/or location, and must create or preserve at least 10 full-time American jobs. Most investors route their funds through regional centers (USCIS-designated entities) that pool EB-5 capital into large-scale projects. Over 90% of EB-5 investments in recent years have been made through these centers rather than via direct investments.Soon after being sworn in as US president, Donald Trump announced he would launch a 'Gold Card'; commerce secretary Howard Lutnick added this could replace the EB-5 program with Gold-Card funds going directly to the US govt. This led to jitters among the EB-5 investors and those aspiring for a Green Card under this investment-linked route.On Sept 19, Trump signed an executive order to introduce the 'Gold Card' visa program. Individuals wishing to qualify for Gold Card must make an unrestricted gift of $1 million (about Rs 8.4 crore) to US Department of Commerce. If a corporation or similar entity makes the gift on behalf of the individual, the required amount rises to $2 million (about Rs 16.8 crore).The modalities of the Gold Card are yet to be rolled out. A key difference between the two programs lies not just in the amounts to be paid, but the fact that the Gold Card entails a 'fee', whereas the EB-5 program requires an 'investment'-with a return on capital.As things stand, the long-term future of the EB-5 program remains unclear. Immigration attorneys point out that the EB-5 Regional Center (RC) Program has been reauthorised until 2027 by the EB-5 Reform and Integrity Act (RIA) of 2022. Those who have invested, or plan to invest, before Sept 2026 will be protected from future lapses in the program owing to the RIA's grandfathering clause. The clause seems to have eased initial jitters among aspiring investors. Many of India's high networth families are turning to this path to secure long-term US residency for their kids. Mid-career professionals already in the US on H-1B visas -where Green Card backlogs stretch to decades-are increasingly joining them.According to US Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) data, the EB-5 program drew $4.1 billion in the first three quarters of FY2025- nearly matching investment for the entire previous year.Since the EB-5 Reform and Integrity Act (RIA) came into effect in 2022, around 1,050- 1,150 Indians have filed EB-5 applications, according to USCIS filing data. This places India as the second-largest EB-5 applicant group globally, accounting for roughly 20- 22% of all new post-RIA filings. The demand has remained consistent month-to-month, driven by both H-1B families already in the US facing decades-long Green Card wait times and by high networth families in India planning long-term residency and education pathways for their children."Most people still believe that once their child gets into a decent US university, they can build a career there," said Piyush Gupta, vice-president of CanAm Enterprises, which operates several licensed regional centers. However, uncertainties arising out of ever-changing and tightening H-1B policies prompts many to explore EB-5, he added.For Prahlad Purohit, a 43-year-old Google engineer from Mumbai, the decision was driven by family rather than finance. After nearly a decade in the US, he feared his two India-born children would lose their dependent status when they turned 21. "My son couldn't even apply for internships because he wasn't a resident," Purohit said over a call from San Francisco. "Both my children grew up here, they don't know the system in India. That's when I chose EB-5."Speaking to TOI on a Zoom from Mountview, California, he recalls how he selected his investment. "It's like the Wild West, with many claiming they're the best and promising exorbitant returns on top of the Green Card-from almond farms to hotel chains," he said. "I finally chose a real estate development in Manhattan that was building a corporate skyscraper."Despite the high approval rate for applications, the EB-5 route remains a high-stakes bet: a blend of financial investment, immigration strategy, and faith in the American market. As Gupta put it, "For many of our clients, this isn't about returns-it's about certainty. They'd rather invest in a project than a house, if it means their family never has to rely on H-1B visa lottery again."
Article Summary: Investment-linked green card program (eb-5) comes in handy for those h-1bs who can afford it. Despite the significant investment involved, a wait-time of a few years compares favourably with an endless wait for the coveted green card. The eb-5 program also finds favour among high networth individuals (hnis) in india.

Article Title: Taliban to appoint its 1st diplomat in Delhi this month
Article Text:
Taliban Confirms India‚Äôs Intel, ISI And Pakistan Army Backing IS-Khorasan Terror Network Operations

NEW DELHI: India and Afghanistan are set to further ramp up their diplomatic relations with the appointment of a diplomat by the Taliban regime here this month. This will be the first official placement of a diplomat by the Taliban in India since their return to Kabul in August 2021 and will be followed - as conveyed by Kabul to Indian authorities - by the appointment of another diplomat in late December or early January.The relationship has progressed steadily this year, culminating in an unprecedented visit by foreign minister Amir Khan Muttaqi to India last month. India has reinforced its role as a trusted partner of Afghanistan with its continued supply of aid and medical supplies to the country, even in the absence of an official recognition by the Indian govt of the dispensation in Kabul.Muttaqi's visit saw India announcing its decision to upgrade its technical mission in Kabul to the level of embassy and also agreeing to accept Taliban diplomats. Both sides are expected to soon have a charge d'affaires leading their respective missions.A Taliban spokesperson on Sunday expressed appreciation for India's donation of over 16 tonnes of anti-vector-borne disease medicines. "This latest donation underscores India's longstanding partnership and developmental support to Afghanistan. By contributing essential medical supplies, India reaffirms its role as a reliable partner in promoting health, stability and humanitarian cooperation in the region," he said.Muttaqi's visit was significant as it also saw the Taliban backing India's sovereignty over J&K. India too has firmly supported Afghanistan's sovereignty and territorial integrity, at a time the Taliban's ties with Pakistan have hit a nadir because of heavy border clashes. The two countries have reached a ceasefire but the threat of an escalation is yet to fully dissipate. The Taliban this week accused Pakistan of working to create chaos in Afghanistan that would allow the US to return and take over Bagram airbase.
Article Summary: This will be the first official placement of a diplomat by the taliban in india since their return to kabul in august 2021. India has reinforced its role as a trusted partner of afghanistan with its continued supply of aid and medical supplies. Both sides are expected to soon have a charge d'affaires leading their respective missions.

Article Title: Magnitude 6.3 earthquake jolts northern Afghanistan; tremors felt in Kabul
Article Text: An Earthquake of magnitude 6.3 struck northern Afghanistan late Sunday into Monday, the United States Geological Survey (USGS) reported. The quake hit the Kholm area near the city of Mazar-i-Sharif at a revised depth of 28 kilometres, and tremors were felt as far as the capital, Kabul, according to AFP correspondents.The USGS had initially recorded the depth at 10 kilometres before updating the figure. The latest quake comes just two months after a powerful 6.0 magnitude tremor in eastern Afghanistan killed more than 2,200 people on August 31, marking one of the deadliest earthquakes in the country‚Äôs recent history.Earthquakes occur frequently in Afghanistan, especially along the Hindu Kush mountain range where the Eurasian and Indian tectonic plates converge. ‚ÄúSince 1900, northeastern Afghanistan has been hit by 12 quakes with a magnitude above 7,‚Äù said Brian Baptie, a seismologist with the British Geological Survey.
Article Summary: The quake hit the kholm area near the city of mazar-i-sharif. Tremors were felt as far as the capital, kabul. The latest quake comes just two months after a powerful 6.0 magnitude tremor in eastern afghanistan killed more than 2,200 people.

Article Title: Nicki Minaj thanks Donald Trump for speaking out on Christian persecution in Nigeria, but her fans aren‚Äôt happy
Article Text: American rapper Nicki Minaj stirred row after publicly thanking President Donald Trump after he spoke out about the persecution of Christians in Nigeria. Minaj praised Trump‚Äôs remarks as ‚Äúpowerful‚Äù and ‚Äúheartfelt,‚Äù but some fans accused her of aligning with the MAGA base.Trump, in a Truth Social post on Friday, claimed that ‚ÄúChristianity is facing an existential threat in Nigeria‚Äù and that ‚Äúradical Islamists are responsible for this mass slaughter.‚Äù He added, ‚ÄúThe United States cannot stand by while such atrocities are happening in Nigeria, and numerous other countries. We stand ready, willing, and able to save our great Christian population around the world!‚ÄùMinaj shared her response, expressing gratitude. ‚ÄúReading this made me feel a deep sense of gratitude,‚Äù she posted on X. ‚ÄúWe live in a country where we can freely worship God. No group should ever be persecuted for practicing their religion. We don‚Äôt have to share the same beliefs in order for us to respect each other.‚ÄùMinaj has been vocal about her Christian faith and its impact on a global scale. ‚ÄúNumerous countries all around the world are being affected by this horror [and] it‚Äôs dangerous to pretend we don‚Äôt notice,‚Äù she said. ‚ÄúThank you to the president [and] his team for taking this seriously.God bless every persecuted Christian. Let‚Äôs remember to lift them up in prayer.‚ÄùHer comments drew praise from some conservatives but backlash from a portion of her fanbase. Others pointed out that Minaj had previously spoken about social justice and women‚Äôs rights, accusing her of inconsistency.The situation in Nigeria remains alarming, with reports of entire villages being destroyed and thousands displaced by Islamist groups. ‚ÄúEven being conservative, it‚Äôs probably 4,000 to 8,000 Christians killed annually,‚Äù said Mark Walker, Trump‚Äôs ambassador-designate for International Religious Freedom. ‚ÄúThis has been going on for years, from ISWAP to Islamist Fulani ethnic militias, and the Nigerian government has to be much more proactive. ‚ÄùTrump has said he directed members of the House Appropriations Committee to investigate and that Nigeria will be redesignated a ‚Äúcountry of particular concern‚Äù under US law, a label reserved for severe violations of religious freedom.
Article Summary: Nicki minaj publicly thanked president donald trump for speaking out about the persecution of christians in nigeria. Her comments drew praise from some conservatives but backlash from a portion of her fanbase. Minaj has been vocal about her christian faith and its impact on a global scale.

Article Title: US‚ÄìChina trade reset: From port fees, tariffs to rare earths ‚Äî What Donald Trump and Xi Jinping agreed on
Article Text:
Trump-Xi Summit: America‚Äôs F-35 Rare Earths 'Weakness' China Won‚Äôt Forget Despite ‚ÄòDeals‚Äô Rush

US agrees to cut tariffs tied to fentanyl-related products

China pauses rare-earth restrictions and lifts retaliation

US pauses expanded tech export blacklist

Beijing removes retaliatory tariffs

Soybean purchases resume

China to lift trade barriers

Port fees and shipping dispute





The trade talks between US President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping in Busan last week resulted in several breakthrough agreements, easing tensions for the two economies.These ranged from soybean purchases, tariff cuts and rare-earth export restrictions and more, though details were initially withheld.The White House on Saturday unveiled the complete terms of the deal, confirming that both sides have agreed to a temporary pause in their prolonged trade dispute.The agreement freezes new tariffs and export curbs, reinstates major agricultural purchases, and creates a one-year negotiation window. The White House said it also blocks a planned 100% tariff on Chinese goods, while China will pause its latest restrictions on rare earth minerals and magnets used in key industries.Here are what the two nations have agreed to:A key provision is a reduction in US tariffs on Chinese imports linked to supplies of precursor chemicals used to make fentanyl. The tariff rate on those products, imposed earlier this year at 20%, will be lowered to 10%.Officials said this will bring the overall US tariff rate on Chinese imports down to roughly 47%, from the current 57%, once Trump‚Äôs earlier duties and a 10% ‚Äúreciprocal‚Äù tariff introduced in April are accounted for, Reuters reported.Beijing has agreed to suspend for one year the new export controls announced this month, which would have required licences for the export of rare earths and magnets, even when present only in trace amounts. The White House described this as ‚Äúthe de facto removal of controls China imposed in April 2025 and October 2022.‚ÄùChina will issue general licences covering rare earths, gallium, germanium, antimony and graphite for US users and their supply chains.Washington has agreed to freeze plans for a one-year expansion of its commerce department entity list, which would have prohibited US companies from selling technology, including semiconductor manufacturing equipment, to any firm more than 50% owned by an already-restricted entity.The measure would have added thousands of additional Chinese companies to the blacklist.China will also suspend all retaliatory tariffs introduced since 4 March, covering a wide range of American products including chicken, wheat, corn, cotton, sorghum, soybeans, pork, beef, aquatic products, fruits, vegetables and dairy.In addition, it will withdraw non-tariff countermeasures taken over the same period, such as putting US companies on ‚Äúend user‚Äù and ‚Äúunreliable entity‚Äù lists, Reuters reported.China has committed to buying at least 12 million metric tonnes of US soybeans during the final two months of 2025, and at least 25 million metric tonnes per year for the following three years. Purchases of US sorghum and hardwood logs will also resume.The White House acknowledged that China had ‚Äúlargely stopped buying US soybeans this autumn,‚Äù after turning to Brazil and Argentina instead.China will extend its market-based tariff exclusion process on US imports until 31 December 2026 and will terminate antitrust, anti-monopoly and anti-dumping investigations targeting American firms in the semiconductor supply chain.Beijing will also restart trade operations from Nexperia‚Äôs China facilities, allowing legacy chip production to reach global markets.China will remove retaliatory measures linked to the US Section 301 investigation into China‚Äôs control over global shipbuilding and logistics. The US, in turn, will pause for one year the new port fees that took effect on October 14, which applied to Chinese-built, -owned and -flagged vessels and were designed to boost US shipbuilding, as per a Reuters report. The White House said these fees, coupled with newly imposed 100% tariffs on Chinese-made ship-to-shore cranes, had already disrupted cargo movements and driven up shipping costs.Negotiations on maritime issues will continue alongside talks with South Korea and Japan on reviving US shipbuilding.The new arrangement marks a fragile but significant de-escalation in the trade war between Washington and Beijing, at least for the next 12 months.
Article Summary: The white house on saturday unveiled the complete terms of the deal. The agreement freezes new tariffs and export curbs, reinstates major agricultural purchases, and creates a one-year negotiation window. A key provision is a reduction in us tariffs on chinese imports linked to supplies of precursor chemicals used to make fentanyl.

Article Title: Sneako calls out Erika Kirk for her viral hug with JD Vance and her bold Charlie Kirk comparison
Article Text:
Sneako calls out Erika Kirk for her viral hug with JD Vance and her bold Charlie Kirk comparison (Image via Getty)

'My Husband... JD Vance': This Erika Kirk Speech STUNS US; Then Comes Their Wild Hug

Erika Kirk compares JD Vance to her late husband Charlie Kirk during TPUSA event

Sneako reacts to Erika Kirk‚Äôs viral hug with JD Vance





A video of Erika Kirk hugging Vice President JD Vance at a Turning Point USA event has gone viral, causing a big online stir. The event took place at the University of Mississippi on Wednesday, October 29, 2025, where Erika, the CEO of TPUSA and widow of Charlie Kirk , introduced JD Vance as a guest speaker.In her speech, she said she saw ‚Äúsimilarities‚Äù between Vance and her late husband, which quickly drew mixed reactions. The hug that followed, where Erika‚Äôs hand appeared to go behind Vance‚Äôs head, made many viewers uncomfortable. Popular streamer Sneako later mocked the moment on X, saying Erika Kirk needed to ‚Äúgrieve her husband a little more.‚Äù The clip has now become one of the week‚Äôs most discussed political moments.During her speech at the TPUSA event in Mississippi, Erika Kirk became emotional while talking about her late husband, Charlie Kirk, who passed away last month.She told the audience that when her team invited Vice President JD Vance to speak, she ‚Äúreally prayed on it‚Äù because the day was ‚Äúvery emotional.‚Äù She then said, ‚ÄúNo one will ever replace my husband. But I do see some similarities of my husband in Vice President JD Vance.‚ÄùRight after that, JD Vance walked onto the stage, and the two hugged. Erika‚Äôs hand was seen resting behind his head while his hand was on her back. The moment quickly went viral after PEOPLE first reported it, leading to heavy backlash online.Streamer Sneako shared his reaction on X on Saturday, joking about the now-famous hug between both personalities. In a video clip, he said, ‚ÄúErika Kirk was grabbing the back of JD Vance‚Äôs head, like she was about to make out with him in leather pants.‚ÄùHe continued, ‚ÄúErika, man, grieve your husband a little more.‚Äù Sneako also mocked her earlier speech where she compared Vance to Charlie Kirk, saying, ‚ÄúNo man can ever compare to my husband‚Ä¶ except JD Vance, he‚Äôs way bigger.‚ÄùAlso Read: YouTuber Matt Wallace‚Äôs Post About Charlie Kirk‚Äôs Widow Erika Kirk Stirs Major Online Fight Over Hidden ‚ÄòCry For Help‚Äô Claim Many users called his remarks harsh but others said he only voiced what many people were already thinking. Neither Erika Kirk nor JD Vance has responded to the criticism, but the clip continues to spread across X and TikTok.
Article Summary: A video of erika kirk hugging vice president jd vance at a turning point usa event has gone viral, causing a big online stir. Erika, the ceo of tpusa and widow of charlie kirk, introduced jd vance as a guest speaker. In her speech, she said she saw ‚Äúsimilarities‚Äù between vance and her late husband, which quickly drew mixed reactions.

Article Title: MLB trade rumors: New York Mets predicted to sign $16 million Atlanta Braves star as Pete Alonso‚Äôs replacement ahead of trade deadline
Article Text:
Pete Alonso (Image via Getty)

New York Mets

Marcell Ozuna

New York Mets Exploring Power Options in the NL East

Marcell Ozuna of the Braves (Image via Getty)

Braves Adopting a New DH Philosophy

Why Marcell Ozuna Fits Perfectly in New York

Player Current Team Awards Estimated Contract Potential Role with Mets Marcell Ozuna



Atlanta Braves



3√ó All-Star, 2√ó Silver Slugger, Gold Glove



$65 Million (existing deal)



Power bat, DH/OF option





Theare entering a crucial offseason, and all eyes are on the uncertain future of their franchise slugger, Pete Alonso. With Alonso potentially heading toward free agency or a trade, the Mets could be forced to find a new power bat to anchor their lineup. One intriguing - and surprising - name emerging as a potential target is Atlanta Braves veteranOzuna, a three-time All-Star, two-time Silver Slugger, and Gold Glove winner, has been a central figure in the Braves‚Äô offensive success in recent seasons. Now, as Atlanta reportedly looks to shift its approach to the designated hitter position, Ozuna‚Äôs future with the team appears uncertain - and the Mets could take advantage of that situation.With Alonso‚Äôs future hanging in the balance, New York Mets‚Äô front office is expected to explore every avenue to maintain offensive firepower. Ozuna could offer a proven, right-handed power bat capable of driving in runs and keeping pressure on opposing pitchers. The 34-year-old slugger remains a formidable threat at the plate, known for his ability to produce consistent power numbers and handle high-leverage situations.Last season, the Braves reportedly attempted to trade Marcell Ozuna at the deadline, but multiple deals fell through. The veteran, who holds 10-5 rights (10 years in MLB, 5 with the same team), was said to have vetoed three separate trade proposals. Despite that, the expectation heading into 2026 is that Atlanta could revisit potential moves involving him as they adjust their roster strategy.Reports suggest that Braves general manager Alex Anthopoulos and his staff are leaning toward a more flexible approach for the designated hitter role. Instead of relying on a full-time DH, the team plans to rotate players like Ronald Acu√±a Jr., Jurickson Profar, Sean Murphy, and Matt Olson through the position to keep them fresh. This marks a strategic shift that could make Ozuna expendable as Atlanta focuses on lineup versatility for the 2026 campaign.If Alonso departs, the New York Mets will need an established veteran presence to fill the void in the middle of their order. Marcell Ozuna‚Äôs proven track record and familiarity with NL East pitching make him an ideal candidate. A short-term deal - likely one or two years - would give New York both stability and flexibility while allowing Ozuna to continue showcasing his value.Also read: MLB trade rumors: Detroit Tigers could sign $130 million Philadelphia Phillies All-Star as he prepares to enter free agency Seeing Marcell Ozuna in Mets colors would certainly shock fans, given his long-standing rivalry with New York as a Brave. However, the move could be exactly what the New York Mets need to stay competitive in the NL East. If Alonso‚Äôs time in Queens is nearing its end, Ozuna could serve as both a short-term spark and a bridge to the next era of Mets baseball - ensuring the team‚Äôs power production doesn‚Äôt skip a beat heading into 2026.
Article Summary: Marcell ozuna is a three-time all-star, two-time silver slugger, and gold glove winner. The braves are reportedly looking to shift their approach to the designated hitter position. Ozuna could offer a proven, right-handed power bat capable of driving in runs. The 34-year-old slugger remains a formidable threat at the plate.

Article Title: Is Fortnite down? Simpsons update, maintenance schedule and more
Article Text:
Image via Fortnite

Fortnite Simpsons maintenance schedule: When will servers return?





North America

Eastern Time (ET): 4:30 PM

Central Time (CT): 3:30 PM

Mountain Time (MT): 2:30 PM

Pacific Time (PT): 1:30 PM

Europe

UK (GMT): 8:30 PM

Central European Time (CET): 9:30 PM

Eastern European Time (EET): 10:30 PM

Asia

India (IST): 1:30 AM (November 2)

Japan (JST): 5:00 AM (November 2)

Korea (KST): 5:00 AM (November 2)

Oceania

Australian Eastern Time (AEDT): 7:00 AM (November 2)

New Zealand (NZDT): 9:00 AM (November 2)

South America

Brazil (BRT): 5:30 PM

Argentina (ART): 5:30 PM

What's new in the Fortnite Simpsons Update





Fortnite players around the world are experiencing server downtime today as Epic Games is rolling out the highly anticipated Simpsons collaboration. This scheduled maintenance began on Saturday, November 1, at 11:30 AM ET.The maintenance break essentially follows the "Welcome, Our Alien Overlords" live event, which gave a glimpse of the Springfield content being introduced to Fortnite. If you are unable to access the game during the break, you don‚Äôt have to worry.The section below takes a detailed look at the maintenance break, new content, and more.Epic Games has scheduled approximately five hours of maintenance for the Fortnite Simpsons update. The servers are expected to return online at 4:30 PM ET; however, the actual downtime could potentially change based on the overall update requirements.Here is when you can expect Fortnite to come back online in your region:Once the maintenance break ends, all the new content will become available to play in Fortnite. Ensure that you have the game updated on your device to seamlessly transition into the v38.00 update.The Simpsons season introduces a completely new Springfield-themed map in Fortnite. It has resulted in the capacity being reduced to 80 players from the usual 100. The map is a bit smaller in size and features iconic locations like Moe's Tavern, Kwik-E-Mart, Springfield Elementary, and the Nuclear Power Plant from the show.Another major highlight of the crossover is the Springfield Battle Pass, which will cost 1,000 V-Bucks. It will feature outfits for Homer, Marge, and Ned Flanders, along with Simpsonized versions of Fortnite characters. Several themed characters will also be added to the Fortnite Item Shop, where you can purchase them.Sidekicks are also a key addition of this update, and they are basically small pet-like companions that will follow you across the map. The first Sidekick, Peels (a banana-themed dog), will be included in the Battle Pass.This was all you needed to know about the Fortnite Simpsons update. You can now enjoy all the new things that the developers have included in the game.
Article Summary: Epic games has scheduled approximately five hours of maintenance for the fortnite simpsons update. The maintenance break essentially follows the "welcome, our alien overlords" live event. The servers are expected to return online at 4:30 pm et; but the actual downtime could potentially change based on the overall update requirements.

Article Title: Chargers linebacker Daiyan Henley‚Äôs brother cause of death: 34-year-old Jabari Henley fatally shot in suspected targeted attack, police confirm
Article Text:
Shooting in Los Angeles kills Jabari Henley, brother of Chargers linebacker Daiyan Henley.

Tragedy strikes just days before Chargers‚Äô matchup against Titans



Family grief deepens amid ongoing legal struggles

Chargers teammates stand by Henley through tragedy

Also read

Los Angeles Chargers linebacker Daiyan Henley is facing a heartbreaking loss after his older brother, Jabari Henley, was shot and killed on October 31, 2025, in Los Angeles. The 34-year-old‚Äôs death has left the Henley family devastated and the NFL community rallying behind the young defender, who now carries the weight of personal grief in the middle of a demanding season. Authorities confirmed that Jabari died after being shot in what investigators believe was not a random attack.Early reports suggest the shooting may have stemmed from a personal dispute, though details remain limited as the Los Angeles Police Department continues to investigate. So far, no arrests have been made, and police have asked witnesses to come forward with any information that could help identify the suspect. The timing of the tragedy couldn‚Äôt be more difficult for Daiyan, who learned the news just days before the Chargers‚Äô scheduled matchup against the Tennessee Titans. Still, the 24-year-old linebacker made the emotional decision to play, turning his pain into motivation.‚ÄúMy brother was more than his life‚Äôs mistakes. He was family. I‚Äôll carry him with me this game,‚Äù Henley said before kickoff.The Henley family has endured multiple heartbreaks in recent years.Daiyan‚Äôs father, Eugene ‚ÄúBig U‚Äù Henley Jr., is currently on trial for the death of Rayshawn Williams, Daiyan‚Äôs close friend and former teammate. That case has already placed the family under intense public scrutiny, and Jabari‚Äôs murder now adds another layer of sorrow and complexity to their lives. Those close to the family say they‚Äôve been leaning on faith and each other while navigating the dual weight of tragedy and public attention. As investigators work through leads, the family continues to plead for justice and privacy.Inside the Chargers camp, teammates and coaches have rallied around Daiyan Henley, offering him space, support, and understanding as he grieves. Those close to the rookie say he‚Äôs remained composed and focused despite the heartbreak. Henley has always been known for his toughness and perseverance ‚Äî traits that helped him rise from his college days at Washington State to the NFL. But this loss has tested him in a way that goes far beyond the game.As the Chargers take the field, fans and teammates will be watching not just his performance, but the quiet strength of a player honoring his brother‚Äôs memory through determination and heart.
Article Summary: Shooting in los angeles kills jabari henley, brother of chargers linebacker daiyan henley. Tragedy strikes just days before chargers‚Äô matchup against titans on october 31, 2025. Authorities confirmed that jabari died after being shot in what investigators believe was not a random attack.

Article Title: World‚Äôs most expensive aquarium fish: A rare dragon fish that symbolises power and fortune worth approx Rs 3 crore
Article Text:
Source: New York Post

The Asian Arowana: Ancient fish that rules the modern aquarium



The Asian Arowana: From banned species to billion-dollar status symbol



The super red Arowana : The fiery dragon fish worth more than gold



Also Read |





For centuries, dragons have embodied prosperity, power, and mystery in Asian culture. Today, that legend lives on in the Asian arowana, famously known as the dragon fish and hailed as the world‚Äôs most expensive aquarium fish. Native to the rivers and swamps of Southeast Asia, this ancient predator moves with elegant precision, its metallic scales shimmering like coins of gold under filtered light. As highlighted by National Geographic, the arowana‚Äôs mythical resemblance to dragons has made it a potent symbol of luck and wealth across generations. Coveted by collectors, enthusiasts, and investors alike, it now commands staggering prices, often exceeding the value of gold, transforming a once humble river dweller into a living emblem of prosperity, success, and timeless prestige.The Asian arowana (Scleropages formosus) is no ordinary tropical fish. Growing up to three feet in length, it glides through the dark waters of Southeast Asia with hypnotic grace, its large, shimmering scales catching light like polished coins. Two slender barbels extend from its chin, evoking the whiskers of a dragon, a resemblance that fuels its legendary reputation as a bearer of fortune, power, and eternal protection across Asian cultures.This prehistoric species, believed to have existed since the age of dinosaurs, thrives in slow-moving rivers and peat swamps in Borneo, Malaysia, and Indonesia. Yet, it is far from a humble creature. In the modern world, an arowana can command prices as high as ¬£250,000 per fish, a valuation that has elevated it from swamp inhabitant to luxury treasure.In the 1970s, the Asian arowana was added to the list of endangered species under CITES (the Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora). The trade ban was meant to protect its dwindling numbers in the wild. Instead, it ignited a new kind of frenzy.The ban transformed the arowana from a simple food fish into an elite, forbidden object of desire. Collectors across Asia began competing for the rare, mystical ‚Äúdragon fish.‚Äù Suddenly, what once sold for a few dollars in a local market became a high-stakes commodity worth tens of thousands.By the late 20th century, farms in Malaysia, Singapore, and Indonesia began breeding the fish legally under government licence. These operations were run like fortresses with guards, surveillance systems, and barbed wire to protect their valuable stock. Each fish was microchipped and issued an identification certificate to prove its legal, captive-bred origin. Despite such measures, black market smuggling and theft became part of the trade‚Äôs darker undercurrent.Among the many colour varieties, green, gold, and silver, the Super Red arowana reigns supreme. Found in the remote Kapuas River basin and the Lake Sentarum wetlands of Borneo, its scales shimmer in rich shades of ruby and crimson. In the right light, it appears almost aflame, like a dragon rising from the depths.This rare beauty can sell for astronomical prices. Reports claim that elite collectors, including high-ranking officials and business magnates, have spent more than ¬£200,000 for a single fish. During international fish exhibitions, these rare specimens are transported in tanks escorted by security guards proof that even a creature of water can inspire terrestrial greed and glamour.Former Indonesian president Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono was said to have owned one himself, paying around ¬£10,000 for his prized arowana. For many, ownership signifies not just wealth, but alignment with luck, prosperity, and spiritual balance.
Article Summary: The asian arowana (scleropages formosus) is no ordinary tropical fish. Growing up to three feet in length, it glides through the dark waters of southeast asia with hypnotic grace, its large, shimmering scales catching light like polished coins.

Article Title: JJ McCarthy‚Äôs fianc√©e Katya steals hearts showing off baby boy‚Äôs adorable Vikings outfit after emotional win vs. Lions
Article Text:
J.J. McCarthy returns with a statement win for Vikings as fianc√©e Katya and baby Rome cheer him on (Getty Images)

Katya Kuropas and baby Rome cheer for Vikings‚Äô star J.J. McCarthy



JJ McCarthy‚Äôs baby boy becomes instant star after Katya shares adorable Vikings outfit following big Lions win (Katya Kuropas/Instagram)

From college glory to family milestones



More coverage on NFL:

J.J. McCarthy made his long-awaited comeback in grand style, leading the Minnesota Vikings to a thrilling 27-24 road win over the Detroit Lions on Sunday. After missing five games with a sprained ankle, McCarthy‚Äôs performance reminded everyone why he‚Äôs one of the NFL‚Äôs most promising young quarterbacks. Throwing for 143 yards and two clutch touchdowns, he powered Minnesota to a .500 record and back into NFC North contention‚Äîjust as both the Lions and Packers stumbled on the same day.But as much as Sunday was about redemption on the field, it was also about family off it.Just weeks after welcoming their first child, McCarthy‚Äôs fianc√©e Katya Kuropas celebrated her partner‚Äôs big win in the sweetest way possible. She shared an adorable photo of baby Rome dressed in his tiny Vikings onesie, calling him dad‚Äôs ‚ÄúNo. 1 fan.‚Äù Born on September 12, little Rome has already become the heart of McCarthy‚Äôs world‚Äîand the newest symbol of joy for the young couple.McCarthy and Kuropas‚Äô love story began long before the NFL lights. They met back in high school at Nazareth Academy in Illinois and have been inseparable ever since. Even when McCarthy transferred to IMG Academy during the pandemic, their bond only grew stronger. After McCarthy led the Michigan Wolverines to the 2024 NCAA Championship, he proposed‚Äîmarking a new chapter in their journey.Their romance has always been filled with genuine affection. On Kuropas‚Äô birthday in January 2025, McCarthy penned a touching message to his ‚ÄúQueen,‚Äù writing, ‚ÄúShe‚Äôs my everything - my muse, my rock, and the heart of my universe. For what is a flame without its wick. A Viking without a star to guide him. Thank you forever, my love, for never wavering when the inevitable storms arise on our voyage together.‚ÄùThe couple‚Äôs relationship has unfolded beautifully both in private and public. In May 2025, they shared that they were expecting their first child, posting, ‚ÄúThe best surprises come when you least expect them. Our sweet baby boy is arriving in September and we couldn‚Äôt be happierü©µüçº.‚ÄùA few months later, their dream came true. They introduced their son to the world, writing, ‚ÄúWelcome to the world Rome Micah McCarthy ‚ú®The sweetest, most perfect gift from God!! We are so unbelievably blessed to be your parentsüíô.‚ÄùAs McCarthy continues to rise in the NFL, it‚Äôs clear that his biggest win isn‚Äôt just on the field‚Äîit‚Äôs the family waiting for him at home.
Article Summary: J.j. mccarthy made his long-awaited comeback in grand style, leading the minnesota vikings to a thrilling 27-24 road win over the detroit lions on sunday. His fianc√©e katya kuropas celebrated her partner‚Äôs big win in the sweetest way possible. She shared an adorable photo of baby rome dressed in his tiny vikings onesie, calling him dad's ‚Äúno.

Article Title: Offset dragged into assault scandal while Cardi B prepares for a family with Stefon Diggs
Article Text:
Offset faces a civil lawsuit from a security guard alleging assault and battery at a MedMen dispensary. This legal battle coincides with public scrutiny of his personal life, including Cardi B's pregnancy with Stefon Diggs. The lawsuit adds to existing perceptions, making this a critical moment for the rapper's reputation.

The MedMen LAX lawsuit adds a legal weapon to an ongoing perception war



Cardi B pregnancy with Stefon Diggs puts Offset‚Äôs name in yet another tabloid cycle

Offset is walking into a perfect storm and this time, it isn‚Äôt a music rollout, a messy tweet, or a rapper-vs-rapper rivalry fueling the headlines. The former Migos rapper is now being dragged into a civil courtroom after a Los Angeles security guard accused him of assault, battery and emotional distress during an incident at a MedMen dispensary earlier this year. Lawsuits are one thing but this situation isn‚Äôt happening in a vacuum.This legal fight arrives at the very same moment Offset‚Äôs personal life is under the microscope again, as his divorce from Cardi B plays out publicly, while she prepares to welcome a baby with Patriots WR Stefon Diggs. It's a scandal, timeline collisions and reputation damage all at once.The guard, Jim Sanchez, alleges he was physically attacked after simply asking Offset for identification, a basic dispensary requirement. His lawsuit describes ‚Äúsignificant physical and emotional injuries,‚Äù a hospital visit, headaches, and neck trauma. Offset‚Äôs side counters with an entirely different story, claiming Sanchez escalated, ‚Äúspat‚Äù at him and charged toward the rapper, which they say triggered Offset to punch back in self-defense.Two versions of the same moment. One real verdict is still pending. But the stakes are bigger than just damages, this is happening in the exact era where Offset‚Äôs public image cannot survive another hit.Cardi B‚Äôs personal arc, from ‚Äúin a good space‚Äù to preparing to have a child with Stefon Diggs in February 2025, has made every Offset headline feel heavier, louder, and more symbolic.Her past accusation that he harassed her, tried to manipulate bloggers, and even contacted his new girlfriend has already shaped how people react to any new allegation involving his name. This case now reads like a character test to fans, not just a police-style incident report.Offset isn‚Äôt just fighting a lawsuit. He‚Äôs fighting a narrative and that may be tougher to beat than Sanchez.Also Read: ‚ÄúHailee gotta sue‚Äù: Stephen A. Smith under fire after bizarre Hailee Steinfeld comment during Josh Allen segment triggers explosive fan outrage
Article Summary: Rapper offset faces a civil lawsuit from a security guard alleging assault and battery at a medmen dispensary. This legal battle coincides with public scrutiny of his personal life, including cardi b's pregnancy with stefon diggs. The lawsuit adds to existing perceptions, making this a critical moment for the rapper's reputation.

Article Title: Is Justin Bieber quitting music? His Halloween Twitch confession about his ‚Äòdaunting tour‚Äô leaves fans heartbroken
Article Text:
Is Justin Bieber quitting music? His Halloween Twitch confession about his ‚Äòdaunting tour‚Äô leaves fans heartbroken (Image via Bieber/Twitch)



Justin Bieber‚Äôs Halloween Twitch confession sparks fears about his touring future

Justin Bieber set to headline Coachella 2026 despite touring doubts





Justin Bieber‚Äôs Halloween Twitch stream has left fans worried and emotional. While carving pumpkins and chatting with fans, the pop star opened up about how touring now feels ‚Äúdaunting. ‚Äù He said he spent most of his life on the road, and even thinking about going back feels overwhelming.Fans quickly began to wonder if Bieber is done with music or just taking a long break. His honest words spread fast online, as ‚ÄúIs Justin Bieber quitting?‚Äù trended across social media. But what‚Äôs even more confusing is that the singer is preparing to headline Coachella 2026. This mix of emotions, anxiety about touring but excitement about Coachella, has everyone asking: what‚Äôs really next for Justin Bieber?Justin Bieber‚Äôs Halloween Twitch stream was meant to be a fun night with pumpkin carvings, jokes, and chill talk. But things changed when Bieber got serious and said touring feels ‚Äúdaunting‚Äù now.He shared that after spending most of his life traveling and performing, the idea of another world tour feels too heavy right now. He said, ‚ÄúTouring takes so much out of you, and I‚Äôve done it since I was a kid.‚Äù Fans in the chat went quiet as they heard him speak so openly. Some felt sad and said he deserves rest after years of nonstop work.Others worried this might mean no big tour anytime soon. Justin Bieber also talked about how fame and money don‚Äôt fix everything and how he now values peace, love, and loyalty more than spotlight moments.Even after that emotional confession, Justin Bieber is not walking away from music just yet. According to People, he is preparing to headline Coachella 2026, his first-ever full solo headline performance at the world-famous festival in Indio, California.Also Read: Sneako Calls Out Erika Kirk For Her Viral Hug With JD Vance And Her Bold Charlie Kirk Comparison He last appeared at Coachella in 2019 with Ariana Grande and again in 2024 with Tems, but this time, it‚Äôs his own big show. Sources close to Justin Bieber told People that he‚Äôs ‚Äúworking hard and feeling excited‚Äù for this major performance.He‚Äôs also planning a creative Skylrk zone at the festival with a drone show and interactive fan experiences. It seems Justin Bieber isn‚Äôt done, he‚Äôs just finding new ways to perform that feel more relaxed and true to him.
Article Summary: Justin bieber‚Äôs halloween twitch stream was meant to be a fun night with pumpkin carvings, jokes, and chill talk. But things changed when bieber got serious and said touring feels ‚Äúdaunting‚Äù now. His honest words spread fast online, as ‚Äúis justin bieber quitting?‚Äù trended across social media.

Article Title: FBI stops ‚ÄòISIS-style‚Äô Halloween attack in Michigan after decoding eerie ‚Äòpumpkin day‚Äô reference
Article Text:
Trump Hails Kash Patel's FBI For Foiling Michigan ‚ÄòTerrorist Attack‚Äô | ‚ÄòCATCHING THEM BEFORE‚Äô

FBI swoops in after 'pumpkin day' clue





Possible connection to ISIS

Political reaction









A potential ISIS-inspired attack in Michigan was foiled just hours before Halloween, after FBI arrested multiple suspects allegedly plotting a ‚Äúpumpkin day‚Äù assault, reports CNN.The operation was carried out early Friday, preventing what director Kash Patel described as a ‚Äúviolent attack‚Äù planned for the holiday weekend.The plan was uncovered after months of online surveillance of a chatroom where several men allegedly discussed carrying out an ISIS-inspired attack in US. According to officials, an undercover FBI operative had been inserted into the group during the early stages of planning.The suspects had recently gone to a shooting range armed with AK-47s and other weapons, practising tactical reloads and firing dozens of rounds. That was when investigators intercepted a spooky reference to ‚Äúpumpkin day‚Äù ‚Äî believed to be a coded term for Halloween. This led the FBI to act immediately.‚ÄúThis morning the FBI thwarted a potential terrorist attack and arrested multiple subjects in Michigan who were allegedly plotting a violent attack over Halloween weekend,‚Äù FBI Director Kash Patel said on X.‚ÄúThanks to the men and women of FBI and law enforcement everywhere standing guard 24/7 and crushing our mission to defend the homeland.‚ÄùRaids were conducted in the Detroit suburbs, where heavily armed FBI and Michigan State Police teams stormed at least three homes. Investigators seized several legally owned firearms, computers and mobile devices as part of their operation.‚ÄúThis all relates to an investigation that started months ago into people who were communicating online with each other here in the United States ‚Ä¶ but also talking to people overseas, possibly connected to ISIS,‚Äù according to CNN‚Äôs chief law enforcement analyst John Miller, citing briefings from officials.At least two suspects have been arrested, while three others are being questioned. Among them, one was identified as a 16-year-old juvenile. The group had allegedly debated the timing of their attack, with some members pushing to strike on Halloween, while others argued they needed more time to prepare.Governor Gretchen Whitmer said she had been briefed on the arrests and thanked authorities for their swift action. ‚ÄúThis morning, I was briefed by Director Patel on the thwarted potential terrorist attack in our state,‚Äù Whitmer posted on X. ‚ÄúAs details continue to develop, I am grateful for the swift action of the FBI and MSP protecting Michiganders.‚ÄùThe FBI‚Äôs Detroit field office confirmed operations in Dearborn and Inkster, saying, ‚ÄúThere is no current threat to public safety.‚Äù The Dearborn Police Department also reassured residents that there was ‚Äúno threat to the community.‚ÄùInvestigators are now probing any links between the arrested individuals and 19-year-old former Michigan Army National Guardsman Ammar Said, who was detained in May for plotting an ISIS-inspired attack on a US Army facility in Warren, Michigan.Officials described the Michigan cell as ‚Äúhome-grown radicals‚Äù with possible overseas connections, and credited close surveillance and quick coordination for preventing what could have been a Halloween tragedy.
Article Summary: Fbi swoops in after 'pumpkin day' clue in online chatroom. Suspects had recently gone to a shooting range armed with ak-47s and other weapons, practising tactical reloads and firing dozens of rounds. The group had allegedly debated the timing of their attack, with some members pushing to strike on halloween, while others argued they needed more time.

Article Title: FBI says Kash Patel breaks no rules when he takes agency jets to meet his girlfriend
Article Text:
Kash Patel vs Joe Kent: War Inside FBI Over Foreign Power Probe In Charlie Kirk Case

Kash Patel pays reimbursement in advance: FBI









The FBI responded to the allegation that director Kash Patel flew on a $60M FBI jet to attend his girlfriend Alexis Wilkins' performance in Pennsylvania, and said he broke no rules while he did that. The allegation came from a former FBI agent-turned-podcaster Kyle Seraphin who commented about Patel flying around the country during the ongoing government shutdown.‚ÄúWe‚Äôre in the middle of government shutdown where they‚Äôre not even gonna pay all of the employees that work for the agency that this guy heads,‚Äù Seraphin said. ‚ÄúAnd this guy is jetting off to hang out with his girlfriend in Nashville on our dime?‚ÄùThis is not the first time that Kash Patel 's use of FBI jets for personal reasons came under fire. This time, the FBI issued a detailed statement comparing Kash Patel's travels with his predecessors, like Chris Wray and James Comey.The FBI director is not allowed to travel in commercial planes and they are only supposed to travel in government planes. Following the established rules, Director Patel pays a reimbursement in advance, Ben Williamson, assistant director for public affairs at FBI, said.Williamson detailed the steps Kash Patel personally takes to minimize spending. When Patel flies, he chooses to take a government airfield instead of airport like DCA (Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport) as the government option is 2.5X cheaper.Williamson said Chris Wray, James Comey, for example, never did that and they mostly used DCA."Kash himself has significantly limited personal travel - but he‚Äôs allowed to take personal time on occasion to see family, friends or his longtime girlfriend. He doesn‚Äôt do it often. He works far more full weekends than he does otherwise. And maybe most importantly - ask anyone who works for him, he‚Äôs on duty 24/7 regardless," the statement said.
Article Summary: The fbi responded to the allegation that director kash patel flew on a $60m fbi jet to attend his girlfriend alexis wilkins' performance in pennsylvania. The fbi issued a detailed statement comparing kash patel's travels with his predecessors, like chris wray and james comey.

Article Title: Wordle today #1596: Hints and answers for today‚Äôs Wordle (November 1, 2025)
Article Text:
How to play Wordle and why it‚Äôs loved by word enthusiasts worldwide



Decode the challenge: Smart strategies to solve Wordle in six moves



Objective: Guess the secret five-letter word within six attempts.

First move: Start with a word containing common vowels and consonants to reveal key letters early.

Enter guess: Type any valid five-letter word and submit it.

Review clues: Green shows the right letter in the right spot, yellow shows the right letter in the wrong spot, and grey means the letter isn‚Äôt in the word.

Strategy tip: Use feedback from each guess to narrow down possibilities.

Avoid mistakes: Skip letters that have already been ruled out.



Final aim: Solve the word within six guesses before running out of tries.

Wordle hints and clues for today‚Äôs puzzle



Starts with M: Today‚Äôs Wordle answer begins with the letter M, giving you a strong starting point for your guesses.

A place to rest on an expressway for travellers: Think of a spot where people can stop, relax, or refuel while travelling on highways, this clue directly relates to the word‚Äôs meaning.

Contains two vowels: The answer includes two vowels, which can help narrow down possible word combinations. Try testing common vowel placements like A, E, or O.

No double letters: There are no repeating letters in today‚Äôs Wordle, so focus on unique letters to avoid wasting guesses.

What is today‚Äôs Wordle answer?

MOTEL

Meaning of Motel





The New York Times‚Äô Wordle remains a daily favourite among word lovers worldwide. Puzzle #1596 challenges players to guess a secret five-letter word in six tries, testing both vocabulary and logic. This guide offers helpful hints, a step-by-step solving breakdown, and the final answer for Wordle #1596, ideal for anyone needing a little extra help. Along with revealing the solution, these clues are crafted to sharpen your guessing strategy, enhance pattern recognition, and improve problem-solving skills. Whether you‚Äôre a casual solver or a devoted Wordle enthusiast, this guide will make each puzzle more fun and rewarding to crack.Wordle is a daily word game that challenges players to uncover a hidden five-letter word in six tries. After each guess, colour-coded tiles provide feedback: green means the letter is correct and in the right position, yellow shows the letter is in the word but in the wrong spot, and grey indicates letters that aren‚Äôt in the word. Its simple yet addictive gameplay has earned worldwide popularity. Wordle helps improve vocabulary, pattern recognition, and strategic thinking.With a new puzzle released every day, it has become a favourite daily ritual for word lovers across the globe.Having trouble with today‚Äôs Wordle? These 4 hints, covering starting letters and vowels, will guide you straight to the solution.Guessing the correct vowels will likely help you find the 5-letter word quickly.The Wordle answer for #1596 on November 1, 2025, is: A motel is a roadside hotel designed mainly for travellers or motorists. It usually features single or low-rise buildings with guest rooms that have parking spaces located directly outside for convenience.
Article Summary: The new york times‚Äô wordle remains a daily favourite among word lovers worldwide. Puzzle #1596 challenges players to guess a secret five-letter word in six tries, testing both vocabulary and logic. Article Title: Mark Zuckerberg's Meta sees profits crashing as it takes a $16 billion tax charge related to Donald Trump's 'Big Beautiful Bill'
Article Text:
Mark Zuckerberg unveils three new Meta AI smart glasses

What Meta said on the $16 billion tax charge

Wall Street not happy with net income falling

CEO Mark Zuckerberg on Meta Q3 results





President Donald Trump's Big Beautiful Bill has resulted in a $16 billion hit for Mark Zuckerberg 's Meta. Meta Platforms has taken a near $16 billion one-off charge in the third quarter (Q3) related to President Trump‚Äôs Big Beautiful Bill. The company, which owns Facebook, WhatsApp and Instagram, said that the bill had led the business to take a non-cash income tax charge of $15.93 billion. Meta said that excluding this, its third-quarter net income would have increased by $15.93 billion to $18.64 billion, compared with the reported net income of $2.71 billion. The expense crashed Meta's third-quarter profit.Incidentally, this is the same bill that Elon Musk and President TrumpThe implementation of Donald Trump's 'One Big Beautiful Bill Act led to ‚Äúthe recognition of a valuation allowance against our U.S. federal deferred tax assets, reflecting the impact of the U.S. Corporate Alternative Minimum Tax,‚Äù Meta said. Meta also said, ‚ÄúWe expect a significant reduction in our U.S. federal cash tax payments for the remainder of 2025 and future years due to the implementation of the One Big Beautiful Bill Act. ‚ÄùThe markets didn't seem pleased with $16 billion charge taken by Meta, as the company's stock fell sharply lower on Wall Street, though briefly.The shares fell $53.60, or 7 per cent, to $698.99 in after-hours trading on Wall Street but recovered to close at $751.67, up less than 1 per cent.‚ÄúWe had a strong quarter for our business and our community,‚Äù Mark Zuckerberg, Meta founder and CEO, said in announcing the results. ‚ÄúMeta Superintelligence Labs is off to a great start and we continue to lead the industry in AI glasses. If we deliver even a fraction of the opportunity ahead, then the next few years will be the most exciting period in our history.‚ÄùThe company ended the quarter with $44.45 billion in cash, cash equivalents and marketable securities. Meta‚Äôs headcount was 78,450 employees as of September 30, up 8% year-over-year.As for quarterly guidance, Meta said that it anticipates fourth quarter total revenue to be $56 billion-$59 billion and full-year 2025 capital expenditures, including principal payments on finance leases, to be $70 billion-$72 billion.
Article Summary: Mark zuckerberg unveils three new meta ai smart glasses. The company, which owns facebook, whatsapp and instagram, said that the bill had led the business to take a non-cash income tax charge of $15.93 billion. The markets didn't seem pleased with $16 billion charge taken by meta, as the company's stock fell sharply lower on wall street.

Article Title: Donald Trump‚Äôs nuclear push sparks confusion: Will tests include explosions? What energy secretary said
Article Text:
Donald Trump & Energy Secretary Chris Wright (File photos)

US Energy Secy Clarifies On Trump's Nuclear Test Bombshell; ‚ÄòNo Choice Left' | Watch





US President Donald Trump has ordered fresh tests of the American nuclear weapons system, sparking questions on whether the United States is preparing to resume nuclear explosions after more than three decades. The announcement was made on social media last week and followed by remarks ahead of his meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping in South Korea.However, US Energy Secretary Chris Wright on Sunday clarified that the testing would not involve nuclear explosions but would instead focus on ‚Äúthe other parts of a nuclear weapon‚Äù to ensure they are working properly.Wright‚Äôs comments came four days after Trump declared that he was ordering the US military to resume nuclear testing ‚Äúon an equal basis‚Äù with other countries, raising the spectre of a return to the worst days of the Cold War. ‚ÄúI think the tests we‚Äôre talking about right now are systems tests,‚Äù Wright said in an interview on the Fox News show The Sunday Briefing. ‚ÄúThese are not nuclear explosions. These are what we call noncritical explosions. ‚ÄùWright said Americans in places such as Nevada, where the United States has a nuclear test site bigger than the state of Rhode Island, should not expect to see a mushroom cloud. On Wednesday ‚Äî minutes before he met with President Xi Jinping of China in South Korea ‚Äî Trump said in a social media post that he was ordering the Pentagon to step up testing of nuclear weapons.‚ÄúWe‚Äôve halted it years ‚Äî many years ‚Äî ago,‚Äù Trump later told reporters, referring to the last US explosive test of a nuclear weapon in 1992. ‚ÄúBut with others doing testing, I think it is appropriate that we do also.‚ÄùWright reiterated that testing was underway on the new nuclear systems. ‚ÄúAnd again, these will be nonnuclear explosions,‚Äù he said, adding, ‚ÄúThese are just developing sophisticated systems so that our replacement nuclear weapons are even better than the ones they were before.‚ÄùThe confusion over Trump‚Äôs intentions began just minutes before his key meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping in South Korea. Posting on his Truth Social platform, Trump appeared to signal that he was preparing to end the decades-long US moratorium on testing nuclear weapons.Later that day, as he returned to Washington, the President remained evasive about whether he was ordering the resumption of full-scale nuclear detonations ‚Äî a practice seen only in North Korea this century ‚Äî or referring instead to routine tests of the systems used to deliver such weapons.Detonation tests are no longer common. The only nation that has been regularly conducting nuclear tests in the past quarter-century is North Korea, whose last test was in September 2017.China has rapidly expanded its nuclear stockpile and deployed missiles in new silos but has not tested a nuclear weapon since 1996. Russia has not conducted a confirmed test since 1990, although it recently declared that it had tested two new delivery vehicles for nuclear weapons ‚Äî a nuclear-powered cruise missile and an undersea torpedo, called Poseidon, capable of crossing the Pacific to the US West Coast. The United States itself routinely tests unarmed missiles.In 1993, the Clinton administration announced plans for a treaty under which nations would forgo nuclear blasts. Although the 1996 test-ban treaty never officially entered into force, it established a global norm of not testing destructive bombs.Washington is currently undertaking a major effort to replace its warheads with updated versions. The overall cost of the sprawling programme over three decades is estimated at $1.7 trillion.
Article Summary: Us energy secretary chris wright on sunday clarified that the testing would not involve nuclear explosions. He said americans in places such as nevada, where the united states has a nuclear test site bigger than the state of rhode island, should not expect to see a mushroom cloud.
